messages.message: Invalid transferFunction in basic DFD block. For an sRGB VkFormat it must be KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB.
messages.details: DFD block #1 transferFunction in basic DFD block is KHR_DF_TRANSFER_LINEAR but for VkFormat VK_FORMAT_ASTC_5x4x4_SRGB_BLOCK_EXT it must be KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB.
